description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Intense Puzzle Action! Match blocks, save orphans, earn points, fall in love, fire lasers and nukes, fall out of love and endure colors like "Cornflower Blue" and "Burnt Sienna"! Wow! Love exclamation points (or unicorns)? You'll love this game!
description.short: Intense Puzzle Action! Match blocks, save orphans, earn points, fall in love, fire lasers and nukes, fall out of love and endure colors like "Cornflower Blue" and "Burnt Sienna"! Wow! Love exclamation points (or unicorns)? You'll love this game!
